txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Ring of Shadow -- Tier 2

Saruman's apprentice, an Orc-defiler of great power, awaits you in the Throne-room of Orthanc. Wielding the Ring of Shadow, he will be a perilous foe to defeat.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 in the shadow wing of the Tower of Orthanc Raid.</rgb>

Saruman's apprentice, an Orc-defiler of great power, awaits you in the Throne-room of Orthanc. Wielding the Ring of Shadow, he will be a perilous foe to defeat.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 in the shadow wing of the Tower of Orthanc Raid.</rgb>
You have claimed the Ring of Shadow
